item.title: Simon Sinek: How great leaders inspire action
item.description:
Simon Sinek: How great leaders inspire action

http://www.ted.com Simon Sinek presents a simple but powerful model for how leaders inspire action, starting with a golden circle and the question "Why?" His examples include Apple, Martin Luther King, and the Wright brothers -- and as a counterpoint Tivo, which (until a recent court victory that tripled its stock price) appeared to be struggling.

item.title: Simon Sinek: Why Leaders Eat Last
item.description:
Simon Sinek: Why Leaders Eat Last

About this presentation In this in-depth talk, ethnographer and leadership expert Simon Sinek reveals the hidden dynamics that inspire leadership and trust. In biological terms, leaders get the first pick of food and other spoils, but at a cost. When danger is present, the group expects the leader to mitigate all threats even at the expense of their personal well-being.

item.title: Super Squat Hip Sequence pre-workout | Feat. Kelly Starrett | MobilityWOD
item.description:
Super Squat Hip Sequence pre-workout | Feat. Kelly Starrett | MobilityWOD

MWOD SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/1bRdYec About MobilityWOD: MobilityWOD is the ultimate guide to resolving pain, preventing injury, and optimizing athletic performance. Humans have been evolving for 2.5 million years and the human body is extraordinarily engineered. While people are born with this incredible machine, they aren't born with the right software to run that machine.
